title: Revealed: The secret dossier that helped George Ford reclaim England's No 10 shirt
text:
It was after a two-hour flight from Durban airport to Cape Town in June last year that George Ford faced one of the defining moments of his career.

In the previous fortnight, Ford had started at fly-half in each of the first two of England’s Test matches against South Africa in Johannesburg and Pretoria.

On each occasion England had raced into a commanding lead only to lose their way and crash to successive defeats that would cost them the series had heap more pressure on head coach Eddie Jones.

That 23-12 loss in Pretoria was a fifth successive Test defeat for England and Jones, under increasing pressure from within the Rugby Football Union and the Premiership clubs, acted decisively.
